column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Varrick says : " Guys , hey , what do you think ?
#Text=" Korra says : " Zhu Li 's in prison with you ?
#Text=" Varrick says : " Of course !
#Text=I do n't go anywhere without my assistant .
#Text=Do you ?
#Text=" Mako says : " We 're not interested in your tea .
#Text=And this is n't a friendly visit .
#Text=" Varrick says : " Do n't tell me you guys are still mad about everything that happened .
#Text=I did some good things , too .
#Text=Korra , who warned you about Unalaq ?
#Text=I did .
#Text=Bolin , who got you into the movers ?
#Text=I did .
#Text=Asami , who saved your company ?
#Text=I did .
#Text=Mako , who got you thrown in jail !?
#Text=I did !
#Text=Oh yeah , guess that was a bad thing .
#Text=" Asami says : " You stole everything from me and you tried to kidnap the president .
#Text=Those are pretty bad , too .
#Text=" Varrick says : " I was n't going to hurt him .
#Text=I just needed to start a war .
#Text=Well , a bigger war .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Well we 're gon na end it .
#Text=Where 's all the stuff you stole from Asami ?
#Text=" Varrick says : " The Future Industries ' stuff ?
#Text=It 's on my battleship .
#Text=" Korra says : " You have a battleship ?
#Text=" Varrick says : " Of course I do !
#Text=I bought the first one they made !
#Text=Named her the " Zhu Li " .
#Text=" Bolin says : " You named your battleship after your assistant ?
#Text=" Varrick says : " Yup .
#Text=They 're both cold , heartless war machines .
#Text=" Zhu Li says : " Your tea , sir .
#Text=" Varrick says : " Look , I 'm truly sorry for the mess I caused .
#Text=Let me make it up to you , take Zhu Li .
#Text=My battleship , it 's yours , and everything on it .
#Text=" Korra says : " It 's not the fleet we were looking for , but it 's the next best thing .
#Text=" Bolin says : " All right !
#Text=Team Avatar is back in business .
#Text=Haha !
#Text=" Mako says : " It 's okay .
#Text=We 're going to stop Unalaq , and get Jinora back .
#Text=" Korra says : " I hope my dad 's all right .
#Text=" Mako says : " I 'm sure he 's fine .
#Text="
